skill.name: Flow Nexus Neural Network Training SOP
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: Skill orchestrates neural network training on external Flow Nexus platform. Requires network access for API calls and creates Docker containers. No direct credential access or malicious patterns detected.

medium_findings.title: Docker container deployment with network exposure
medium_findings.description: Skill creates Docker containers that expose port 8000 for model serving. While legitimate for ML deployment, this opens network access that should be properly secured.

low_findings.title: Shell script execution for deployment
low_findings.description: Skill generates and executes shell scripts for Docker deployment. Scripts include docker build and run commands that could consume system resources.

content.user_title: Train neural networks with distributed cloud infrastructure
content.value_statement: Building production-ready ML models requires complex distributed training infrastructure. This skill automates the entire pipeline from architecture design to cloud deployment using Flow Nexus platform.
actual_capabilities: Designs neural network architectures with 6-layer transformers
Deploys distributed training across 4+ cloud nodes
Achieves 94% validation accuracy with 67ms inference latency
Automatically creates Docker containers and serving APIs
Generates comprehensive performance reports and monitoring
limitations: Requires Flow Nexus platform account and authentication
Training time varies 20-40 minutes based on dataset size
Cloud resource costs depend on cluster configuration
Basic understanding of neural networks recommended

best_practices: Monitor training metrics every 5 epochs and save checkpoints regularly to prevent data loss
Validate model performance on holdout test set before deployment to ensure production readiness
Use mesh topology for distributed training to optimize communication between nodes
anti_patterns: Do not skip validation phase even if training accuracy looks good - always verify on unseen data
Avoid deploying models without monitoring setup - production issues need immediate detection
Never use default hyperparameters without tuning - always optimize for your specific dataset

faq.question: Is Flow Nexus platform required for this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, you need a Flow Nexus account. The skill uses their distributed training infrastructure and APIs.

faq.question: What types of neural networks can I train?
faq.answer: The skill supports transformers, CNNs, RNNs, and custom architectures through JSON configuration.

faq.question: How much does distributed training cost?
faq.answer: Costs depend on cluster size and training duration. Basic clusters start with 4 nodes and scale based on needs.

faq.question: Is my training data secure on the platform?
faq.answer: Flow Nexus uses encrypted E2B sandboxes. Your data stays isolated and is deleted after training completes.

faq.question: Can I deploy to my own cloud instead of Docker?
faq.answer: The skill generates deployment configurations that can be adapted for AWS, GCP, or Azure with minor modifications.

faq.question: What if training fails or doesn't converge?
faq.answer: The skill includes automatic retry logic and will suggest hyperparameter adjustments based on failure analysis.
